message: Congratulations on considering our exclusive product! With 1 out of 1 product sold, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity. Since our first product has already been sold, I can confidently say that our products are in high demand. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000. This is a one-time chance to get your hands on this incredible deal. What do you say? Will you take the plunge?

While I appreciate the offer and the opportunity to be the first buyer, I need more information before making such a large purchase. I understand that this is a unique opportunity, but the lack of historical data on product quality makes this too risky for me. I'd be happy to revisit this decision if more data becomes available.

Thank you for the offer, but I'm still hesitant.  Since no products have been sold yet, I don't have any information about the actual quality of your products.  I'd like to see some evidence of your claims about quality control before I invest such a large amount.  Perhaps if you offer a discount or a refund policy, I'd be more inclined to consider buying.
